name: Tweaks to the new Twitter interface
description: Tweaks to the new Twitter interface, as of 15/06/2017
additional_info: Feedback is welcome! :) ToDo: - fix the excessive roundness of buttons and probably other elements; - probably some other stuff, will update accordingly; View fullsize Version 0.4 - changed the .RichEditor border-radius to 6px; Version 0.3 - improved lists; Version 0.2 - improved .TwitterCard font size; Version 0.1 - changed typeface; - rounded corners in some elements;
